revisions.rev:
{{Infobox artist discography | Artist = [[SG Wannabe]] | Image = | Image size = | Caption = | Alt = | Studio = 11 | Studio link = Studio albums | Live = 4 | Live link = Concerts | Compilation = 3 | Comp link = Compilation albums | Internet = | Internet link = | Video = | Video link = | Music videos = 41 | MV link = Music videos | EP = 18 | EPs link = EPs | Singles = | Singles link = | B-sides = | B link = | Soundtrack = 11 | Soundtrack link = Participation in OSTs | Tribute = 1 | Trib link = Tribute | Option = 16 | Option name = Other works | Option link = Other works | Option color = }} {{Contains Korean text}} This is the '''[[discography]]''' of the [[South Korean]] [[boy band]] [[SG Wannabe]]. SG Wannabe have been in the music business ever since debuting in the 2004. They have currently released seven studio albums, three special albums, and two special edition (remix) albums. They have participated in many other albums and OSTs. They are also the first group in the world to release their album in a digital disc format. SG Wannabe had pre-sales of 90,000 copies of their first debut album, which helped them earned their "Best Newcomer" award at the 2004 [[Golden Disk Awards]]. When 2005 was over, SG Wannabe were ranked at #1, with over 400,000 copies sold of their 2nd album, and 12th, with 147,047 copies sold of their remake album on the year-end chart.[http://english.kbs.co.kr/entertainment/news/1379213_11858.html SG Wannabe sells 400,000 copies of its album in 2005] ''KBS GLOBAL''. Retrieve on June 13, 2007. With the release of their 4th album and their title song, they went as the #1 in the Bugs Chart as well as the Korea monthly chart. The album was also number one on the "Top 20 Album Sales (May 2007)" with 44,618 copies sold in May and 125,450 sold altogether.{{cite news | first= | last= | coauthors= | title= Top 20 Album Sales (May 2007) | date=2006-07-18 | publisher= | url = http://daintymist.wordpress.com/2007/06/19/top-20-album-sales-may-2007/| work= Escaping To Another Realm| pages = | accessdate = 2007-06-26 }} Selling almost 200,000 copies, ''The Sentimental Chord'' was the best-selling album of 2007 in Korea[http://www.miak.or.kr/stat/kpop_2007_2.htm 1ì ê°ììë° íë§¤ëì§ê³].
